item.radiationmod.radiation_wand.tooltip: Used to create and modify radiation zones
Use /radiation command to create the zone.
item.radiationmod.radiation_filter.toolt: Requires a full hazmat suit to be effective
message.radiationmod.missing_hazmat_suit: Filter requires full Hazmat suit to work!
item.radiationmod.bear_trap.tooltip.info: Place on the ground to trap players
Hold right mouse button for 5 seconds to release
Deals 5 hearts of damage when triggered
message.radiationmod.bear_trap.caught: You've been caught in a bear trap! You can't move!
message.radiationmod.bear_trap.opening: Hold right click for 5 seconds to open the trap...
tooltip.radiationmod.detector: Used to detect and modify radiation zones
tooltip.radiationmod.detector.usage: Right-click to set radiation zone, then right-click on block to create zone
tooltip.radiationmod.detector.usage2: If already in a radiation zone, right-clicking changes the radiation level
message.radiationmod.detector.set_positi: First point set at X:%1$s Y:%2$s Z:%3$s. Click again to create radiation zone with level %4$s.
message.radiationmod.detector.zone_creat: Radiation zone created from X:%1$s Y:%2$s Z:%3$s with level %4$s.
message.radiationmod.detector.zone_updat: Radiation level at X:%1$s Y:%2$s Z:%3$s changed to %4$s.
message.radiationmod.radiation.protected: Your protection is working against radiation
message.radiationmod.radiation.critical_: CRITICAL RADIATION DOSE! YOU RECEIVED LETHAL EXPOSURE!
death.attack.radiationmod.radiation.play: %1$s received a lethal dose of radiation while fighting %2$s
item.radiationmod.balaclava.tooltip.info: A head covering that protects from cold
